title: Breadth First and Depth First Algorithms
body:
A simple simulation of Breadth First Traversal and Depth First traversal
on an undirected graph created by the user.
name: BFS and DFS

title: Dijkstra's Shortest Path Algorithm
body:
A simulation of Djikstra's Shortest Path Algorithm and finding the shortest
paths from the chosen source vertex to all the nodes.
name: Dijkstra's Algorithm

title: Kruskal's Minimal Spanning Tree
body:
A simple simulation Kruskal's Algorithm for finding the Minimal Spanning
Tree of a connected undirected weighted graph.
name: Kruskal's MST

title: Linear Search Algorithm
body:
A simple simulation of Linear Search and Binary Search on an array of integers meant
for understanding them better.
name: Linear Search

title: Binary Search Algorithm
body:
A simple simulation of Linear Search and Binary Search on an array of integers meant
for understanding them better.
name: Binary Search

title: Interpolation Search Algorithm
body:
A simple simulation of Linear Search and Binary Search on an array of integers meant
for understanding them better.
name: Interpolation Search

title: Sorting Visualizer
body:
Simulation of Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort and Quick Sort on
randomly chosen data values.
name: Sorting Algorithms
